Swollen	ankles,	feet	and	
fingers
Ankles,	feet	and	fingers	often	
swell a little in pregnancy 
because your body is holding 
more water than usual. Towards 
the end of the day, especially if 
the weather is hot or if you 
have been standing a lot, the 
extra water tends to gather in 
the lowest parts of yo
